name: EcoWatering
0:
”Alexa, talk to eco watering”
”Alexa, ask eco watering”
”Alexa, open eco watering”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eco watering
des: Smart controller is developed by Nxeco Inc. Echo could provide one easy tool to operate the smart irrigation controller. The following commands are implemented for irrigation such as: Garden 2, please. Water zone 2 for 3 min. , Delay 24 hrs. and more.
